page_builder.text:
Last updated: January 25, 2025

By submitting the contact form, you acknowledge and agree to the following privacy terms:

Information Collection and Use

When you submit this form, DataWorks collects and stores the information you provide, which may include:

  • Your name
  • Email address
  • Phone number
  • Message content
  • Any additional information you choose to share

Purpose and Processing

We use this information solely to:

  • Respond to your inquiry or request
  • Maintain a record of our communications
  • Improve our customer service
  • Contact you regarding your submission

Data Storage and Security

  • Your information is stored on our protected servers
  • We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data
  • We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy

Information Sharing

  • We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties
  • Your information may be accessed by authorized DataWorks employees only as necessary to respond to your inquiry
  • We may share your information if required by law or to protect our legal rights

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Request access to your personal data
  • Request correction of inaccurate data
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Withdraw your consent at any time
  • Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

Terms of Service and Risk Disclosure

THIS LEGALLY BINDING AGREEMENT (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") is entered into between DataWorks Protocol (hereinafter referred to as "DataWorks," "we," "us," or "our") and any individual or entity (hereinafter referred to as "User," "you," or "your") accessing, participating in, or utilizing the DataWorks Protocol and its associated digital assets, including but not limited to $DATA tokens (collectively, the "Protocol").


Definitions and Interpretations

For the purposes of this Agreement, the following terms shall have the meanings assigned to them below:

  • "$DATA tokens" refers to the native digital asset of the DataWorks Protocol
  • "Protocol" encompasses all software, smart contracts, interfaces, and infrastructure comprising the DataWorks ecosystem
  • "Computational Resources" refers to processing power, storage, and associated infrastructure provided through the Protocol
  • "Node Operation" refers to the participation in the Protocol's distributed network
  • "Smart Contracts" refers to self-executing contracts with terms directly written into code


Investment Acknowledgement and Risk Disclosure

  • High-risk Investment Warning

    You expressly acknowledge and agree that participation in the Protocol constitutes a high-risk investment in an experimental technological infrastructure project. The value of $DATA tokens may experience extreme volatility, including but not limited to:
    a) Complete loss of value
    b) Rapid and unexpected price fluctuations
    c) Susceptibility to market manipulation
    d) Exposure to technological vulnerabilities

  • Speculation and Market Dynamics

    The cryptocurrency and digital asset markets are highly speculative and subject to various external factors, including but not limited to:
    a) Global market conditions
    b) Regulatory changes
    c) Technological advancements
    d) Competitor activities
    e) Macroeconomic events
    f) Social sentiment
    g) Network effects
    h) Liquidity constraints

Project Development and Implementation

  • Development Timeline Disclaimers

    DataWorks retains sole and absolute discretion to:
    a) Modify development roadmaps
    b) Alter technical specifications
    c) Adjust feature implementations
    d) Revise protocol mechanics
    e) Update tokenomics models
    f) Implement emergency protocol changes

  • Intellectual Property and Technical Modifications

    We reserve the right, without prior notice or compensation, to:
    a) Modify protocol architecture
    b) Update smart contract implementation
    c) Revise consensus mechanisms
    d) Alter network parameters
    e) Implement security patches
    f) Deploy protocol upgrades

Financial and Legal Disclaimers

  • Investment Advisory Disclaimer

    You explicitly acknowledge that:
    a) No communication, documentation, or interaction with DataWorks team members constitutes financial, investment, legal, or tax advice
    b) All investment decisions are made at your sole discretion and risk
    c) Past performance does not indicate future results
    d) Token valuations are subject to extreme uncertainty

  • Regulatory Compliance

    You represent and warrant that:
    a) Your participation complies with all applicable laws in your jurisdiction
    b) You are not subject to sanctions or restricted party lists
    c) Your participation does not violate any applicable securities regulations
    d) You have conducted necessary due diligence regarding regulatory compliance

Token Allocation and Governance

  • Team and Development Allocation

    The following token allocations are irrevocable and non-negotiable:
    a) Core team compensation allocation
    b) Development fund allocation
    c) Ecosystem growth allocation
    d) Strategic reserve allocation

  • Vesting and Distribution

    Token distributions are subject to:
    a) Predetermined vesting schedules
    b) Smart contract-enforced lock-up periods
    c) Performance-based milestone releases
    d) Market condition adjustments

Technological Risks and Limitations

  • Infrastructure Risks

    You acknowledge the following technological risks:
    a) Smart contract vulnerabilities
    b) Blockchain network congestion
    c) Oracle manipulation
    d) Consensus attacks
    e) Protocol exploitation
    f) Cryptographic weaknesses
    g) Network partitioning
    h) Data availability issues

  • Operational Disclaimers

    The Protocol is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind, whether express, implied, or statutory, including but not limited to:
    a) Merchantability
    b) Fitness for a particular purpose
    c) Non-infringement
    d) Error-free operation
    e) Uninterrupted service
    f) Security guarantees

Limitation of Liability

  • Damage Limitations

    To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, neither DataWorks nor its team members shall be liable for:
    a) Direct damages
    b) Indirect damages
    c) Incidental damages
    d) Special damages
    e) Consequential damages
    f) Punitive damages
    g) Lost profits
    h) Lost data
    i) Business interruption
    j) Loss of goodwill

  • Indemnification

    You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless DataWorks and its team members from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses arising from:
    a) Your use of the Protocol
    b) Your violation of these terms
    c) Your violation of applicable laws
    d) Your interaction with smart contracts

Protocol Governance and Modifications

  • Protocol Changes

    DataWorks reserves the right to:
    a) Implement protocol upgrades
    b) Modify economic parameters
    c) Adjust incentive mechanisms
    d) Update security measures
    e) Revise network rules

  • Governance Participation

    Token holders acknowledge that:
    a) Governance participation is not guaranteed
    b) Voting power may be subject to change
    c) Proposal mechanisms may be modified
    d) Governance parameters may be adjusted

Termination and Suspension

  • Termination Rights

    DataWorks reserves the right to:
    a) Suspend or terminate your access to the Protocol
    b) Disable features or functionality
    c) Implement emergency shutdown procedures
    d) Freeze smart contract interactions

Governing Law and Jurisdiction

  • This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Dubai, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
  • Any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Dubai.

Severability

If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

Acknowledgement

BY PARTICIPATING IN THE DATAWORKS PROTOCOL, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTOOD, AND AGREE TO BE BOUND BY ALL OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS AGREEMENT, AS WELL AS ALL APPLICABLE LAWS AND REGULATIONS.
